<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension"></a>

# OpenXRAPIExtension

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Makes the OpenXR API available for GDExtension.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**OpenXRAPIExtension** makes OpenXR available for GDExtension. It provides the OpenXR API to GDExtension through the [get_instance_proc_addr()](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_instance_proc_addr) method, and the OpenXR instance through [get_instance()](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_instance).

It also provides methods for querying the status of OpenXR initialization, and helper methods for ease of use of the API with GDExtension.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [XrResult documentation](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html)

- [XrInstance documentation](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrInstance.html)

- [XrSpace documentation](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSpace.html)

- [XrSession documentation](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSession.html)

- [XrSystemId documentation](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSystemId.html)

- [xrBeginSession documentation](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/xrBeginSession.html)

- [XrPosef documentation](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrPosef.html)

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_OpenXRAPIExtension_OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_OpenXRAPIExtension_OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport)

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_constant_OPENXR_ALPHA_BLEND_MODE_SUPPORT_NONE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#enum_OpenXRAPIExtension_OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport) **OPENXR_ALPHA_BLEND_MODE_SUPPORT_NONE** = `0`

Means that [XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND](XRInterface.md#XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND) isn't supported at all.<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_constant_OPENXR_ALPHA_BLEND_MODE_SUPPORT_REAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#enum_OpenXRAPIExtension_OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport) **OPENXR_ALPHA_BLEND_MODE_SUPPORT_REAL** = `1`

Means that [XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND](XRInterface.md#XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND) is really supported.<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_constant_OPENXR_ALPHA_BLEND_MODE_SUPPORT_EMULATING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#enum_OpenXRAPIExtension_OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport) **OPENXR_ALPHA_BLEND_MODE_SUPPORT_EMULATING** = `2`

Means that [XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND](XRInterface.md#XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND) is emulated.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_action_get_handle"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **action_get_handle**\ (\ action\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_action_get_handle)

Returns the corresponding ``XrAction`` OpenXR handle for the given action RID.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_begin_debug_label_region"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **begin_debug_label_region**\ (\ label_name\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_begin_debug_label_region)

Begins a new debug label region, this label will be reported in debug messages for any calls following this until [end_debug_label_region()](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_end_debug_label_region) is called. Debug labels can be stacked.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_can_render"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **can_render**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_can_render)

Returns ``true`` if OpenXR is initialized for rendering with an XR viewport.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_end_debug_label_region"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **end_debug_label_region**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_end_debug_label_region)

Marks the end of a debug label region. Removes the latest debug label region added by calling [begin_debug_label_region()](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_begin_debug_label_region).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_find_action"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **find_action**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md), action_set\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_find_action)

Returns the [RID](RID.md) corresponding to an ``Action`` of a matching name, optionally limited to a specified action set.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_error_string"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_error_string**\ (\ result\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_error_string)

Returns an error string for the given [XrResult](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_hand_tracker"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_hand_tracker**\ (\ hand_index\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_hand_tracker)

Returns the corresponding ``XRHandTrackerEXT`` handle for the given hand index value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_instance"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_instance**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_instance)

Returns the [XrInstance](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrInstance.html) created during the initialization of the OpenXR API.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_instance_proc_addr"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_instance_proc_addr**\ (\ name\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_instance_proc_addr)

Returns the function pointer of the OpenXR function with the specified name, cast to an integer. If the function with the given name does not exist, the method returns ``0``.

\ **Note:** ``openxr/util.h`` contains utility macros for acquiring OpenXR functions, e.g. ``GDEXTENSION_INIT_XR_FUNC_V(xrCreateAction)``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_next_frame_time"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_next_frame_time**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_next_frame_time)

Returns the predicted display timing for the next frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_play_space"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_play_space**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_play_space)

Returns the play space, which is an [XrSpace](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSpace.html) cast to an integer.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_predicted_display_time"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_predicted_display_time**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_predicted_display_time)

Returns the predicted display timing for the current frame.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_projection_layer"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_projection_layer**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_projection_layer)

Returns a pointer to the render state's ``XrCompositionLayerProjection`` struct.

\ **Note:** This method should only be called from the rendering thread.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_render_state_z_far"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_render_state_z_far**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_render_state_z_far)

Returns the far boundary value of the camera frustum.

\ **Note:** This is only accessible in the render thread.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_render_state_z_near"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_render_state_z_near**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_render_state_z_near)

Returns the near boundary value of the camera frustum.

\ **Note:** This is only accessible in the render thread.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_session"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_session**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_session)

Returns the OpenXR session, which is an [XrSession](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSession.html) cast to an integer.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_supported_swapchain_formats"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedInt64Array](PackedInt64Array.md) **get_supported_swapchain_formats**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_supported_swapchain_formats)

Returns an array of supported swapchain formats.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_swapchain_format_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_swapchain_format_name**\ (\ swapchain_format\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_swapchain_format_name)

Returns the name of the specified swapchain format.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_system_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_system_id**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_get_system_id)

Returns the id of the system, which is an [XrSystemId](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSystemId.html) cast to an integer.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_insert_debug_label"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **insert_debug_label**\ (\ label_name\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_insert_debug_label)

Inserts a debug label, this label is reported in any debug message resulting from the OpenXR calls that follows, until any of [begin_debug_label_region()](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_begin_debug_label_region), [end_debug_label_region()](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_end_debug_label_region), or [insert_debug_label()](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_insert_debug_label) is called.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_is_environment_blend_mode_alpha_supported"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#enum_OpenXRAPIExtension_OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport) **is_environment_blend_mode_alpha_supported**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_is_environment_blend_mode_alpha_supported)

Returns [OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport](OpenXRAPIExtension.md#enum_OpenXRAPIExtension_OpenXRAlphaBlendModeSupport) denoting if [XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND](XRInterface.md#XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND) is really supported, emulated or not supported at all.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_is_initialized"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_initialized**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_is_initialized)

Returns ``true`` if OpenXR is initialized.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_is_running"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_running**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_is_running)

Returns ``true`` if OpenXR is running ([xrBeginSession](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/xrBeginSession.html) was successfully called and the swapchains were created).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_openxr_is_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **openxr_is_enabled**\ (\ check_run_in_editor\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="static">static</span> [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_openxr_is_enabled)

Returns ``true`` if OpenXR is enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_openxr_swapchain_create"></a>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_openxr_swapchain_get_swapchain"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **openxr_swapchain_get_swapchain**\ (\ swapchain\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_openxr_swapchain_get_swapchain)

Returns the ``XrSwapchain`` handle of the provided swapchain.

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **register_frame_info_extension**\ (\ extension\: [OpenXRExtensionWrapper](OpenXRExtensionWrapper.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_register_frame_info_extension)

`void` **set_custom_play_space**\ (\ space\: `const void*`\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_set_custom_play_space)

Sets the reference space used by OpenXR to the given [XrSpace](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrSpace.html) (cast to a ``void *``).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_set_emulate_environment_blend_mode_alpha_blend"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_emulate_environment_blend_mode_alpha_blend**\ (\ enabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_set_emulate_environment_blend_mode_alpha_blend)

If set to ``true``, an OpenXR extension is loaded which is capable of emulating the [XRInterface.XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND](XRInterface.md#XRInterface_constant_XR_ENV_BLEND_MODE_ALPHA_BLEND) blend mode.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_set_object_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_object_name**\ (\ object_type\: [int](int.md), object_handle\: [int](int.md), object_name\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_set_object_name)

Set the object name of an OpenXR object, used for debug output. `object_type` must be a valid OpenXR ``XrObjectType`` enum and `object_handle` must be a valid OpenXR object handle.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAPIExtension_method_xr_result"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **xr_result**\ (\ result\: [int](int.md), format\: [String](String.md), args\: [Array](Array.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAPIExtension_method_xr_result)

Returns ``true`` if the provided [XrResult](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html) (cast to an integer) is successful. Otherwise returns ``false`` and prints the [XrResult](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.0/man/html/XrResult.html) converted to a string, with the specified additional information.
